title: Survey finds nearly half of American adults doubt the safety of vaccines
author: Vicki Martinka
description: Physicians say even small margins of doubt over vaccine safety and efficacy can cause significant damage to public health if they result in more unvaccinated people.
cleaned_text: We're introducing a new way for you to log in to the AOA's websites. If you haven't already established your new login credentials, here's how to get started: Your username This is the email address associated with your AOA account.
